title: Lois de probabilité continues
text:
runif(1, min = 0, max = 1)

[1] 0.6096471

curve(dunif(x, min = 0, max = 1), 
      col = "red", 
      xlim = c(-0.2, 1.2), 
      main = "Densité de la loi Uniforme")







curve(punif(x, min = 0, max = 1), 
      col = "red", 
      xlim = c(-0.2, 1.2), 
      main = "Fonction de répartition de la loi Uniforme")
